original: Diurlin, Jarl Yngve, major, Halmstad, nu Sthlm, f. 6/9/03 i Sthlm av isjökapt. Gustaf D. o. Gerda Messina Thedéa Wahlquist. G. m. Signhi/ld Berg. Barn: Per f. 39, Gustaf 42, Ylva 46. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 24, off:-ex. 26, KHS 34-36. Fänrik v. Skarab. reg. 26, und:’löjtn. 28, ilöjtn. 30, kapi. v. gen :’stabskåren 40, v. HaiLl. reg. 44, major i armén 44, v. Hall reg. 45, major v. gen :isit!ab’sikiàren md. 46. RSO, SkytteM.
translated: Diurlin, Jarl Yngve, Major, originally from Halmstad, now residing in Stockholm. He was born on 6th September 1903 in Stockholm to the Icebreaker Captain Gustaf D. and Gerda Messina Thedéa Wahlquist. He married Signhild Berg. They had three children: Per born in 1939, Gustaf born in 1942, and Ylva born in 1946. He completed his studentexamen in Gothenburg in 1924, officer's exam in 1926, and attended the Military Academy Karlberg from 1934-1936. He was promoted to Fänrik in Skaraborgs regiment in 1926, Underlöjtnant in 1928, Löjtnant in 1930, Captain in 1940 in the General Staff Corps, Halmstad regiment in 1944, Major in the army in 1944, Halmstad regiment in 1945, and Major in General Staff Corps in 1946. He was awarded the Order of the Sword and the Skytte Medal.
